name: pokemon_battle_simulator
description: An MCP server that provides comprehensive Pokémon data and simulates battles between any two Pokémon.

tools.description: Simulates a Pokémon battle between two specified Pokémon, providing a detailed log of the fight and declaring a winner.

pokemon1.description: The name of the first Pokémon for the battle.

pokemon2.description: The name of the second Pokémon for the battle.

resources.description: Provides comprehensive information about Pokémon, including stats, types, abilities, and moves.

pokemon_name.description: The name of the Pokémon to query for data.
